info.title: CostManagementClient
info.description: CostManagement management client provides access to CostManagement resources for Azure Enterprise Subscriptions.

tags.name: Benefits API
tags.description: APIs for getting benefit recommendations and benefit utilization summaries.

get.description: List of recommendations for purchasing savings plan.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: May be used to order the recommendations by: properties/armSkuName. For the savings plan, the results are in order by default. There is no need to use this clause.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the properties by: properties/usage, properties/allRecommendationDetails

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists savings plan utilization summaries for the enterprise agreement scope. Supported at grain values: 'Daily' and 'Monthly'.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Supports filtering by properties/benefitId, properties/benefitOrderId and properties/usageDate.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists savings plan utilization summaries for billing profile. Supported at grain values: 'Daily' and 'Monthly'.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Supports filtering by properties/benefitId, properties/benefitOrderId and properties/usageDate.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the savings plan utilization summaries for daily or monthly grain.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the savings plan utilization summaries for daily or monthly grain.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Triggers generation of a benefit utilization summaries report for the provided billing account. This API supports only enrollment accounts.

parameters.name: benefitUtilizationSummariesRequest
parameters.description: Async Benefit Utilization Summary report to be created.

200.description: The status of the generation of the benefit utilization summaries report. This could be in progress, failed, or completed.

202.description: Accepted. Request will be processed. Use the location header to check the status.

Location.description: The URL to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Triggers generation of a benefit utilization summaries report for the provided billing account and billing profile.

parameters.name: benefitUtilizationSummariesRequest
parameters.description: Async Benefit Utilization Summary report to be created.

200.description: The status of the generation of the benefit utilization summaries report. This could be in progress, failed, or completed.

202.description: Accepted. Request will be processed. Use the location header to check the status.

Location.description: The URL to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

nextLink.description: The link (URL) to the next page of results.

benefitRecommendationProperties.description: The properties of the benefit recommendations.

firstConsumptionDate.description: The first usage date used for looking back for computing the recommendations.

lastConsumptionDate.description: The last usage date used for looking back for computing the recommendations.

lookBackPeriod.description: The number of days of usage evaluated for computing the recommendations.

totalHours.description: The total hours for which the cost is covered. Its equal to number of records in a property 'properties/usage/charges'.

usage.description: On-demand charges between firstConsumptionDate and lastConsumptionDate that were used for computing benefit recommendations.

term.description: Term period of the benefit. For example, P1Y or P3Y.

commitmentGranularity.description: Grain of the proposed commitment amount. Supported values: 'Hourly'

currencyCode.description: An ISO 4217 currency code identifier for the costs and savings amounts.

costWithoutBenefit.description: The current cost without benefit, corresponds to 'totalHours' in the look-back period.

recommendationDetails.description: The details of the proposed recommendation.

allRecommendationDetails.description: The list of all benefit recommendations with the recommendation details.

scope.description: Benefit scope. For example, Single or Shared.

singleScopeBenefitRecommendationProperti.description: The properties of the benefit recommendations when scope is 'Single'.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription ID that this single scope recommendation is for. Applicable only if recommendation is for 'Single' scope.

resourceGroup.description: The resource group that this single scope recommendation is for. Applicable only if recommendation is for 'Single' scope and 'ResourceGroup' request scope.

sharedScopeBenefitRecommendationProperti.description: The properties of the benefit recommendation when scope is 'Shared'.

recommendationUsageDetails.description: On-demand charges between firstConsumptionDate and lastConsumptionDate that were used for computing benefit recommendations.

usageGrain.description: The grain of the usage. Supported values: 'Hourly'

charges.description: On-demand charges for each hour between firstConsumptionDate and lastConsumptionDate that were used for computing benefit recommendations.

value.description: The list of benefit recommendations with the recommendation details..

nextLink.description: The link (URL) to the next page of results.

allSavingsList.description: The list of all benefit recommendations with the recommendation details.

overageCost.description: The difference between total cost and benefit cost for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period.

benefitCost.description: The estimated cost with benefit for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period. It's equal to (commitmentAmount * totalHours)

totalCost.description: Total cost, which is sum of benefit cost and overage cost.

savingsAmount.description: The amount saved for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, by purchasing the recommended quantity of the benefit.

savingsPercentage.description: The savings in percentage for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, by purchasing the recommended quantity of benefit.

coveragePercentage.description: Estimated benefit coverage percentage for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, with this commitment.

commitmentAmount.description: The commitment amount at the commitmentGranularity.

averageUtilizationPercentage.description: Estimated average utilization percentage for the 'totalHours' in the look-back period, with this commitment.

values.description: Hourly grain corresponds to value per hour.
values.name: Hourly

values.description: Hourly grain corresponds to value per day.
values.name: Daily

values.description: Hourly grain corresponds to value per month.
values.name: Monthly

LookBackPeriod.description: The number of days used to look back.

value.description: The list of benefit utilization summaries.

nextLink.description: The link (URL) to the next page of results.

BenefitUtilizationSummaryProperties.description: The properties of a benefit utilization summary.

armSkuName.description: ARM SKU name. For example, 'Compute_Savings_Plan' for savings plan.

benefitId.description: The benefit ID is the identifier of the benefit.

benefitOrderId.description: The benefit order ID is the identifier for a benefit purchase.

usageDate.description: Date corresponding to the utilization summary record. If the grain of data is monthly, value for this field will be first day of the month.

properties.title: Benefit utilization summary for benefit kind Included Quantity.

utilizationPercentage.description: This is the utilized percentage for the benefit ID.

properties.title: Benefit utilization Summary for benefit kind savings plan.

avgUtilizationPercentage.description: This is the average hourly utilization for each date range that corresponds to given grain (Daily, Monthly). Suppose the API call is for usageDate > 2023-08-01 and usageDate < 2022-10-31 at a daily granularity. There will be one record per benefit id for each day. For a single day, the avgUtilizationPercentage value will be equal to the average of the set of values where the set contains 24 utilization percentage entries one for each hour in a specific day.

minUtilizationPercentage.description: This is the minimum hourly utilization for each date range that corresponds to given grain (Daily, Monthly). Suppose the API call is for usageDate > 2023-08-01 and usageDate < 2022-10-31 at a daily granularity. There will be one record per benefit id for each day. For a single day, the minUtilizationPercentage value will be equal to the smallest in the set of values where the set contains 24 utilization percentage entries one for each hour in a specific day. If on the day 2022-10-18, the lowest utilization percentage was 10% at hour 4, then the value for the minUtilizationPercentage in the response will be 10%.

maxUtilizationPercentage.description: This is the maximum hourly utilization for each date range that corresponds to given grain (Daily, Monthly). Suppose the API call is for usageDate > 2023-08-01 and usageDate < 2022-10-31 at a daily granularity. There will be one record per benefit id for each day. For a single day, the maxUtilizationPercentage value will be equal to the largest in the set of values where the set contains 24 utilization percentage entries one for each hour in a specific day. If on the day 2022-10-18, the largest utilization percentage was 90% at hour 5, then the value for the maxUtilizationPercentage in the response will be 90%.

BenefitUtilizationSummariesOperationStat.description: Status of a benefit utilization summaries report. Provides Async Benefit Utilization Summaries Request input, status, and report sas url.

input.description: Input given to create the benefit utilization summaries report.

status.description: The status of the creation of the benefit utilization summaries report.

properties.description: Contains sas url to the async benefit utilization summaries report and a date that the url is valid until. These values will be empty if the report is in a Running or Failed state

AsyncOperationStatusEnum.description: Enum representing the status of an async operation.

AsyncOperationStatusProperties.description: Object representing the report url and valid until date of the async report generated.

reportUrl.description: Sas url to the async benefit utilization summaries report. Will be empty if the report is in Running or Failed state.

secondaryReportUrl.description: Sas url to async benefit utilization summaries report in secondary storage in case of primary outage. Will be empty if the report is in Running or Failed state.

validUntil.description: The date that the sas url provided in reportUrl expires.

BenefitUtilizationSummaryReportSchema.description: The CSV file from the reportUrl and secondaryReportUrl blob link will consist of the following columns of benefit utilization data. UtilizedPercentage will be 0 for savings plans reports and non data bricks reservations. Utilization percentages will be 0 for data bricks reservations.

BenefitUtilizationSummariesRequest.description: Properties of an async benefit utilization summaries request.

billingAccountId.description: Billing account the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for billing account and billing profile scopes. Not supported for any benefit scopes.

billingProfileId.description: Billing profile id the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for billing profile scope. Not supported for billing account or any benefit scopes.

benefitOrderId.description: Benefit order id the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for benefit order and benefit id scopes. Not supported for any billing scopes.

benefitId.description: Benefit id the benefit utilization summaries report is for. Required for benefit id scope. Not supported for benefit order or any billing scopes.

grain.description: The grain the summaries data is served at in the report. Accepted values are 'Daily' or 'Monthly'.

startDate.description: The start date of the summaries data that will be served in the report.

endDate.description: The end date of the summaries data that will be served in the report.

kind.description: The type of benefit data requested. Required for billing account and billing profile scopes. Implied and not to be passed at benefit scopes. Supported values are Reservation and SavingsPlan

benefitAsyncOperationIdParameter.description: Operation id of the report being generated
benefitAsyncOperationIdParameter.name: operationId

benefitRecommendationsFilterParameter.name: $filter
benefitRecommendationsFilterParameter.description: Can be used to filter benefitRecommendations by: properties/scope with allowed values ['Single', 'Shared'] and default value 'Shared'; and properties/lookBackPeriod with allowed values ['Last7Days', 'Last30Days', 'Last60Days'] and default value 'Last60Days'; properties/term with allowed values ['P1Y', 'P3Y'] and default value 'P3Y'; properties/subscriptionId; properties/resourceGroup

billingScopeBenefitRecommendationParamet.name: billingScope
billingScopeBenefitRecommendationParamet.description: The scope associated with benefit recommendation operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resource group scope, /providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for enterprise agreement scope, and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billing profile scope

values.description: Hourly grain corresponds to value per hour.
values.name: Hourly

values.description: Hourly grain corresponds to value per day.
values.name: Daily

values.description: Hourly grain corresponds to value per month.
values.name: Monthly
